name: 3D Platformer (mmenke)
description:
I made this level as my final for a Game Scripting class.  As this was my first attempt at level design, my focus was to create something visually interesting.

Notes: The double jump does not like to work when moving down slopes, probably because  my code thinks the player is in the air. The game also does not have a restart or a quit button, so you will have to do those manually.
